title: LOL won't open(The LOGO comes for 2-3 secs then disappears)
body: I just open lol, then the LOGO comes up, then disappears 2-3 seconds later. I've tried literally everything to fix it. This has been on for 2 days. I need to play LOL NOW!!!!

replies.body: Bump. Now i got the client on and patching but it stays at 33%. Please fix this rito!
You're using both NA and OCE accounts? Could that have anything to do with it?
